content: tried to call in.. but it appears no meeting. can someone please confirm..

Email from Jamie a couple of hours ago:

Hi folks,

As the deadline for placing ballot comments is in less than 2 weeks, we are cancelling today's FHIR subgroup call to give everyone a dedicated slot to review the ballot content at http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/2021MAY/index.html and place comments in the ballot desktop (http://www.hl7.org/ctl.cfm?action=ballots.vote&ballot_cycle_id=555) if they haven't already.

I'll be on Zulip if there are any questions, don't hesitate to reach out.

Happy commenting!
--
Jamie Jones
Program Coordinator
Boston Children's Hospital | Computational Health Informatics Program
Office: 617.355.5176
Meeting was cancelled on the HL7 calendar as well. Let me know if you aren't getting those notifications
I do get them... but they are very slow in arriving.. many times 12 hours or more before I see them through the listserv.. not sure what I can do about that..

Only suggestion I have is to double check your subscription settings on this page: http://www.hl7.org/myhl7/managelistservs.cfm

image.png
